details:
This update for go1.21 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-45288: Fixed denial of service via HTTP/2 continuation frames (bsc#1221400)
                                                                                  
Other changes:                                                                  
- go minor release upgrade to 1.21.9 (bsc#1212475)

package.name: go1.21
